extension.summary: Duration converter from MMM to H:MM, H, MM
extension.description: Converts movie durations from format MMM to H:MM, H, MM[CR]Example: 113 minutes could be converted to 1:53 using DurationAxbmcuser.Duration[CR][CR]Property names:[CR](home) DurationAxbmcuser.Duration[CR](home) DurationAxbmcuser.Duration.Hours[CR](home) DurationAxbmcuser.Duration.Minutes[CR](home) DurationAxbmcuser.DBID[CR][CR]For use with other containers like home screen widgets set the following properties:[CR][CR](home) DurationAxbmcuser.WidgetContainerId[CR]to the container ID (Example: 8000)[CR](home) DurationAxbmcuser.WidgetContainerWindowName[CR]to the window name where the container resides (Example: home)[CR][CR]Known supported Skins:[CR]A Confluence ZEITGEIST
